```{r}
#| label: setup
#| message: false
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
x <- read_csv(file = "data/mass-tracts.csv")
```

```{r}
x |>
  ggplot(aes(x = med_income, fill = race)) + 
  geom_density(alpha = 0.5) + 
  scale_x_continuous(limits = c(0, 250000), breaks = seq(0, 250000, 50000)) 
```
